description: This file defines a React functional component called TopNav, which renders a top navigation bar with title, theme toggle, and user authentication controls, including wishlist and cart counts. It manages theme state, handles sign-out, and interacts with auth and custom hooks.

methods.name: TopNav({ title = "Home", onMenu })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the top navigation bar, manages theme toggle, sign-out, and displays links and counts based on user state.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Toggles the theme between light and dark modes by updating the component state.

methods.name: onSignOut
methods.description: Handles user sign-out asynchronously, swallowing errors silently.
